title: AHS 8: It's Happening
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: The teasers have been goosebumpin' me giving me spine shivers... "It's happening" are my ideal words when I think of ww3 or invasion. You folks are harnessing the paranoia many of us have in a box in the back of our minds. Real fear is the best fear ;) ty kindly, All

I'm excited and nervous 
Last few seasons havnt been as good as I would have hoped
But I still LOVE the show
I have so much anxiety from this on god i don't know why lmao this season is going to good I can feel it in my bones
Michael Langdon will be the best😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍
description:
Are you TRULY ready for the apocalypse?
AHS premieres Wednesday September 12th, 2018.
